title: Honor in aram
body:
I have not seen this being addressed anywhere so it may be a non issue but as someone who loves to play aram I want to confirm if honor works the same in aram as in other modes. 
I want to know if people get the same amount of honor on aram as they would if they were to play on summoners rift. I dont mean honor form teammates but the amount of honor that you get passively for playing.
I know that you get less IP and mastery points and while this should not affect honor I just want to make sure.

replies.body: AFAIK you still get the same amount of relative Honor exp from playing ARAMs that you would by playing Summoners Rift.
